start_quest.title: The Adventure Begins
start_quest.text:
Armed with your enchanted weapon and accompanied by your mystical companion, 
you stand at Hellstrom Castle's gates. The kingdom stretches before you, parts 
already touched by the Shadow's corruption.

Knight Commander Kira approaches with a map and supplies.

"The Shadow's source lies in the Darkwood to the north," she explains. "But 
beware - the corruption has twisted the land itself. Creatures there are no 
longer what they once were."

Your companion stands ready beside you, and your weapon hums with elemental 
power. The fate of Hellstrom Kingdom now rests in your hands.

[ADVENTURE CONTINUES...]

Thank you for playing Chapters 1 & 2 of The Traveler's Stone!

The quest to defeat the Shadow awaits in Chapter 3...

quit.title: End of Journey
quit.text:
You decide to end your adventure for now.
                
Thank you for playing The Traveler's Stone! Your journey awaits your return...
